property.name: tailer.history.dir
property.description: Required. Specifies the job history files's location.The files should be rotated by hour.

property.name: tailer.history.file
property.description: Required. Specifies the job history filename to "tail -f"

property.name: tailer.history.filename.regex
property.description: Required. Specifies the job history filename' regex expression to match files under ${recorver.history.dir}. The group(1) of the matcher should be date filed if matched.

property.name: tailer.history.backoff
property.description: Optional. Specifies the hours before now, during which the rotated history files should be parse before start to tail ${tailer.history.file}.
